text: وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱرْكَعُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ

translation.en.sahih: And establish prayer and give zakah and bow with those who bow [in worship and obedience].
translation.id.indonesian: Dan dirikanlah shalat, tunaikanlah zakat dan ruku'lah beserta orang-orang yang ruku'.
